From: Cisco IOS Configuration Fundamentals Command Reference
FuncDef: To clear the low-water-mark memory, use the **clear memory low-water-mark** command in privilegedEXEC mode.

ParaDef.Info: This commmand has no arguments or keywords.

Examples: The following example shows how to clear the low-water-mark memory:
ExtraInfo: This command clears all processor threshold values and the input/output memory threshold values, if any.

RelatedCmds.description: Configures a router to issue system logging message notifications when available memory falls below a specified threshold.
